# Color Overview Vista Graphics provides multiple ways to specify colors for drawing operations. ## Color Specification Methods - **Named Colors**: CSS color names (red, blue, green) - **RGB**: Red, Green, Blue values (0-255) - **RGBA**: RGB with alpha transparency - **Hex**: Hexadecimal color values (#FF0000) - **HSL**: Hue, Saturation, Lightness ## Quick Reference `draw canvas [ pen red fill blue box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## Color Applications - **pen**: Outline color - **fill**: Fill color - **font-color**: Text color ## See Also - [Named Colors](/wiki/graphics/colors/named-colors/) - Named color reference - [RGB & RGBA](/wiki/graphics/colors/rgb-rgba/) - RGB color reference - [Gradient Fills](/wiki/graphics/colors/gradient-fills/) - Gradient colors
